title: Ya llego
short_description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua
large_description:
Falset is an application which combines the beacons and geolocalization technologies to guide the user inside the village through touristic routes and show the user the most important and historic places of the village.

The app is developed natively for Android and iOS (you can find it in both stores) using native technology and the backend has been developed using the Slim Framework.
